title: Canadian Police Warn of Surge in Home Invasion-Style Robberies Targeting Affluent Crypto Investors
description: Canadian law enforcement reports that affluent cryptocurrency investors have become targets of home invasion-style robberies. Both Delta Police and Royal Canadian Mounted Police in Richmond have issued warnings after having dealt with multiple robberies involving prominent cryptocurrency investors over the past year.
